author: Jeanbon P
comment: Even though this may be less flexible than the black face (which I have) these are still the best quality faces for my LG R out there. The quality of the rendering is superb. Worth every penny, thanks.
title: The best I've seen.

author: Andrew Staley
comment: The watch face looks blurry on my Moto 360.
title: Looks blurry on Moto 360

author: Jared Leith
comment: Some more settings please though dev, like the black version which has many options for customising.
title: Looks great, but more custom option's please.

author: Summer Ellington
comment: Download and install but can't find app.. Really like the black version got this one bec  I want the same thing just white background.

reply.author: Pujie
reply.content: Hi Summer, sorry for the late reply, did it show up already? Otherwise, Pujie Black allows white background now as well..

title: Help! Can't find face?

author: David Cloutier
comment: Never shows up on my lg watch r urban

author: sansy cat
comment: Beautiful Watch face. Please make it customizable

author: Arjun Rudra
comment: This is a great warchface, its just unfortunate that it doesn't have the same level of customization the black version does. Really hope the dev decides to revisit this watchface because it really is nice!
title: Beautiful Design and Potential

author: Tim Wood
comment: The black version of his face cones with countless customisation options, this one is static. Shows potential if you plan to add customisation later, though. Will keep it on my radar.
title: No customisation - shows potential.

author: Jim Y
comment: no options for a paid for watch face?? the black version has a ton of options. the blue face 2. install or uninstall. at least give us the same level of options as the black version. sorry. have to request a refund for this one.
title: no option!

author: Meike Morren
comment: Very nice looking watch face. Love the subtle animations when the screen turns on!
title: Lovely
